snippet: The private sector added 216,000 jobs in February, according to the payroll processor ADP, lifting markets that on Tuesday suffered their sharpest declines in three months.
abstract: Stocks break a three-day losing streak, recovering some losses after a report shows the private sector added more jobs than expected in February.
lead_paragraph: The private sector added 216,000 jobs in February, according to the payroll processor ADP, lifting markets that on Tuesday suffered their sharpest declines in three months.

headline.seo: Stocks Rebound After a Positive Jobs Report
headline.main: A Positive Jobs Report Stops a Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: A Positive Jobs Report Stops a Losing Streak
